main.name: Meirunas Smitas
main.descriptionEnd: Helping companies with their web needs
main.bio: I have gained over 3 years of full-time frontend experience in the pharma agency 28b. I developed multiple web/iOS solutions, internal tools, and marketing materials for clients. In another similar role I created and maintained a static and interactive website. Prior to these roles I was studying an MSc and a BSc Computer Science at London Universities. I launched a frontend dev hub to share my experience and improve my teamwork skills. I have experience in HTML, SCSS, JS, Vue.js and React.js. In addition, I have been following client requirements created on Adobe applications, such as, InDesign, XD and Powerpoint. Over 13 years in IT environment I built a wide range of skills that will benefit your company.
main.subject: Contact From Meirunas's Portfolio

work.title: Vue.js Developer
work.description: Creating UI for recruitment website and testing. Setting up website skeleton for the recruiter side and reusing parts for the candidate side. Helping finalise candidate side and colloborating in meetings. Using RESTful API for backend interaction. Created Stripe and Paypal payment flows, PSPs configuration and authentication system forms with Django, MongoDB backend.

work.title: IT Administrator
work.description: Developed ASC website, Moodle and updated the web contents, digital data and features for both the website and VLE.

work.title: Junior Developer
work.description: Implemented Digital Sales Aids for iOS/Web platforms using the Veeva and IQVIA APIs that helped clients with their sales. Developed responsive emails including CRM, Salesforce and iPad. Implemented internal tools that helped to increase the quality of the software and made the delivery processes faster. Using Code Standard guidelines and best engineering practices such as Code reviews, Git branching strategy, and CI/CD. Involved in Agile practices. Improved internal documentation (Company Wiki).

work.title: Website Developer
work.description: Creating an appropriate design for the company website from scratch and making it available online. Choosing and installing the optimal plugins for database, video chat and location map. Maintaining website by uploading and updating information.
